about_the_game:
"Shadowed Journey" is a Metroidvania-like game. The player plays a disciple of a fairy sect who is mainly a sword cultivator and secretly goes down the mountain to return home. However, in this Dharma-ending era, the mortal world has long been corrupted, and what awaits you is a journey to hell. All you can rely on is your flying sword and your heart.

Three cultivation systems
  • Sword cultivation: Based on the flying sword, the flying sword can not only be used as a support for stepping, but also for flying in the later stage.
  • Magic cultivation: Magic cultivation mainly cultivates karma fire, which will amplify the desire of the cultivator. Desire will not only affect the development of the plot, but also affect the protagonist's magic cultivation skills.
  • Mechanical: Auxiliary skills, can control some mechanical creations.
